actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional personal exemption of $750 for the disability of the taxpayer or his spouse.

summary.text: Provides an additional personal exemption of $750 for the disability of the taxpayer or his spouse under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 151 (d))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional personal exemption of $750 for the disability of the taxpayer or his spouse.
